title: Arrival in Nagoya! 🏯
summary: My Japan adventure begins! I'll arrive in Nagoya and start exploring this fascinating city that's often overlooked by tourists. I'm most excited to see Nagoya Castle with its famous golden shachihoko and try the local specialty - hitsumabushi (grilled eel over rice)!

activities.description: Check in and explore Nagoya Castle

images.caption: 🏨 My hotel area in central Nagoya

highlight: Discovering Nagoya's hidden gems and experiencing a less touristy side of Japan. I've heard the locals are incredibly welcoming! 💕
